short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have your own second brain for Youtube. Summarize videos and save notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I am Himanshu Srivastava, a 22-year old software developer based in Bengaluru, India.
Linkedin: https://linkedin.com/in/himanshuSri24
Github: https://github.com/himanshuSri24
Mail: mailto:himanshu20032002@gmail.com
Website: https://devwithcoffee.com
Project Link: https://www.devwithcoffee.com/projects/second-brain-for-youtube/

I learn a lot from YouTube, and I wanted to build a tool that could help me retain and apply that knowledge. So, I built a second brain using AI, which helps me learn better and faster! üöÄ

This is a chrome extension which automatically transcribes summarizes the content of the videos I watch. üß† Not just that, it can also save the markdown files for easy editing. ‚ú®

I decided to take things a little further and added the feature for it to directly store the transcriptions and summary to Capacities as well! üìù

Is this extension free?
Yes, the extension is free to use. You can download it from the Chrome Web Store.

Is this project open-source?
No. This project is not open-source. However, I might consider open-sourcing it in the future.

Is my data safe?
Yes, your data is safe. The extension does not store any data on the server. All the data is either downloaded by you on your machine or stored on your Capacities accounts.

Do I require any subscriptions to use this extension?
No. You do not require any subscriptions to use this extension. I built this extension to help the community and make it accessible to everyone, hence everything so far is free. However, if you like the extension and want to support me, you can buy me a coffee.

What is the privacy policy of this extension?
The privacy policy of this extension is simple. We only store the required analytics data to improve the extension. We do not store any personal data of the user. All your data is safe and secure and belongs to you.

What are the terms of use?
The terms of use are simple. You can use the extension for personal use. Commercial usage of this extension is not allowed. Also, you cannot modify the extension and redistribute it. You can use the extension as is and share it with your friends and family.
